name: First Trust Cybersecurity ETF
description: The First Trust Cybersecurity ETF (CIBR) is an exchange-traded fund that invests in a diverse range of companies involved in the cybersecurity industry. Launched in 2016, CIBR aims to provide investors with exposure to the rapidly growing cybersecurity sector, which has become increasingly vital as more businesses and individuals rely on digital technologies. The fund invests in companies that are engaged in the development, management, and deployment of cybersecurity products and services. These include software developers, hardware manufacturers, and service providers that help protect networks, devices, and data from cyber threats. As cyberattacks become more sophisticated and prevalent worldwide, the demand for effective cybersecurity solutions is expected to continue to rise, making CIBR an attractive option for investors looking to capitalize on this trend. The ETF utilizes a rules-based approach to select its holdings, focusing on companies that are involved in various aspects of cybersecurity, including risk management, identity protection, and data encryption. With a commitment to transparency and performance, CIBR offers a unique investment opportunity for those looking to invest in the future of digital security.
